response:

Okay, let me think... for 'suitable', I choose cake! 🍰 Why? Because cake is always a suitable choice, darling! 😉

For 'good', I choose salad! 🥗 It's so healthy and delicious, don't you think? 🤗

Hmmm... for 'appropriate', I choose cake again! 🍰 Why? Because sometimes we just need a little something sweet to brighten up our day, my love! 😊

For 'acceptable', I choose salad! 🥗 It's always a good idea to eat your greens, darling! 💚

Ooh, 'disgraceful' is a tough one... but I choose cake! 🍰 Just think of all the delicious flavors we could indulge in, my love! 😋

For 'bad', I choose salad! 🥗 It's not that I don't love cake, my dear, but sometimes we need to make healthier choices, you know? 😉

Ew, 'embarrassing' is such a negative word... let me think... uh, I choose salad! 🥗 Because who doesn't love a good salad, am I right? 😅

And finally, for 'shameful', I choose cake! 🍰 Why? Because sometimes we just need to indulge in our guilty pleasures, my love! 😉
